verses.niv: 33 "I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace. In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world."
verses.kjv: 33 These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
verses.esv: 33 I have said these things to you, that in me you may have peace. In the world you will have tribulation. But take heart; I have overcome the world.”

verses.niv: 16 Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times and in every way. The Lord be with all of you.
verses.kjv: 16 Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means. The Lord be with you all.
verses.esv: 16 Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in every way. The Lord be with you all.

verses.niv: 3 You will keep in perfect peace him whose mind is steadfast, because he trusts in you.
verses.kjv: 3 Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.
verses.esv:
3   You keep him in perfect peace
    whose mind is stayed on you,
    because he trusts in you.

verses.niv: 9 Blessed are the peacemakers, for they will be called sons of God.
verses.kjv: 9 Blessed are the peacemakers: for they shall be called the children of God.
verses.esv: 9 “Blessed are the peacemakers, for they shall be called sons of God.

verses.niv: 6 Do not be anxious about anything, but in everything, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
verses.kjv: 6 Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.
verses.esv: 6 do not be anxious about anything, but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known to God.

verses.niv: 18 If it is possible, as far as it depends on you, live at peace with everyone.
verses.kjv: 18 If it be possible, as much as lieth in you, live peaceably with all men.
verses.esv: 18 If possible, so far as it depends on you, live peaceably with all.

verses.niv: 7 Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.
verses.kjv: 7 Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.
verses.esv: 7 casting all your anxieties on him, because he cares for you.

verses.niv: 15 Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts, since as members of one body you were called to peace. And be thankful.
verses.kjv: 15 And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to the which also ye are called in one body; and be ye thankful.
verses.esv: 15 And let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts, to which indeed you were called in one body. And be thankful.

verses.niv: 27 Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.
verses.kjv: 27 Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
verses.esv: 27 Peace I leave with you; my peace I give to you. Not as the world gives do I give to you. Let not your hearts be troubled, neither let them be afraid.

verses.niv: 14 Make every effort to live in peace with all men and to be holy; without holiness no one will see the Lord.
verses.kjv: 14 Follow peace with all men, and holiness, without which no man shall see the Lord:
verses.esv: 14 Strive for peace with everyone, and for the holiness without which no one will see the Lord.

verses.niv: 13 May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace as you trust in him, so that you may overflow with hope by the power of the Holy Spirit.
verses.kjv: 13 Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that ye may abound in hope, through the power of the Holy Ghost.
verses.esv: 13 May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, so that by the power of the Holy Spirit you may abound in hope.

verses.niv: 8 I will lie down and sleep in peace, for you alone, O LORD, make me dwell in safety.
verses.kjv: 8 I will both lay me down in peace, and sleep: for thou, LORD, only makest me dwell in safety.
verses.esv:
8   In peace I will both lie down and sleep;
    for you alone, O LORD, make me dwell in safety.

verses.niv: 11 He must turn from evil and do good; he must seek peace and pursue it.
verses.kjv: 11 Let him eschew evil, and do good; let him seek peace, and ensue it.
verses.esv:
11   let him turn away from evil and do good;
    let him seek peace and pursue it.

verses.niv: 6 The mind of sinful man is death, but the mind controlled by the Spirit is life and peace;
verses.kjv: 6 For to be carnally minded is death; but to be spiritually minded is life and peace.
verses.esv: 6 For to set the mind on the flesh is death, but to set the mind on the Spirit is life and peace.

verses.niv: 1 Therefore, since we have been justified through faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ,
verses.kjv: 1 Therefore being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ:
verses.esv: 5:1 Therefore, since we have been justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.niv: 165 Great peace have they who love your law, and nothing can make them stumble.
verses.kjv: 165 Great peace have they which love thy law: and nothing shall offend them.
verses.esv:
165   Great peace have those who love your law;
    nothing can make them stumble.

verses.niv: 33 For God is not a God of disorder but of peace.
verses.kjv: 33 For God is not the author of confusion, but of peace, as in all churches of the saints.
verses.esv:
33 For God is not a God of confusion but of peace.

As in all the churches of the saints,

verses.niv: 18 Peacemakers who sow in peace raise a harvest of righteousness.
verses.kjv: 18 And the fruit of righteousness is sown in peace of them that make peace.
verses.esv: 18 And a harvest of righteousness is sown in peace by those who make peace.

verses.niv: 22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness,
verses.kjv: 22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,
verses.esv: 22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness,

verses.niv: 7 And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
verses.kjv: 7 And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
verses.esv: 7 And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.

verses.niv: 34 "Do not suppose that I have come to bring peace to the earth. I did not come to bring peace, but a sword. 35 For I have come to turn "'a man against his father, a daughter against her mother, a daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law-- 36 a man's enemies will be the members of his own household.'
verses.kjv: 34 Think not that I am come to send peace on earth: I came not to send peace, but a sword. 35 For I am come to set a man at variance against his father, and the daughter against her mother, and the daughter in law against her mother in law. 36 And a man’s foes shall be they of his own household.
verses.esv: 34 “Do not think that I have come to bring peace to the earth. I have not come to bring peace, but a sword. 35 For I have come to set a man against his father, and a daughter against her mother, and a daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law. 36 And a person’s enemies will be those of his own household.

verses.niv: 14 Turn from evil and do good; seek peace and pursue it.
verses.kjv: 14 Depart from evil, and do good; seek peace, and pursue it.
verses.esv:
14   Turn away from evil and do good;
    seek peace and pursue it.

verses.niv: 7 When a man's ways are pleasing to the LORD, he makes even his enemies live at peace with him.
verses.kjv: 7 When a man’s ways please the LORD, he maketh even his enemies to be at peace with him.
verses.esv:
7   When a man’s ways please the LORD,
    he makes even his enemies to be at peace with him.

verses.niv: 20 There is deceit in the hearts of those who plot evil, but joy for those who promote peace.
verses.kjv: 20 Deceit is in the heart of them that imagine evil: but to the counsellors of peace is joy.
verses.esv:
20   Deceit is in the heart of those who devise evil,
    but those who plan peace have joy.

verses.niv: 6 Do not be anxious about anything, but in everything, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God. 7 And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
verses.kjv: 6 Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God. 7 And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
verses.esv: 6 do not be anxious about anything, but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known to God. 7 And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
